posts.text:
Góða kveldið, ættla kanna áhugan á þessari þrusu vél  
Ársgömul Dell Inspiron 17R SE
17.3" Full HD WLED Truelife display (1080p)
Intel Core i7-3630QM (2.4GHz - 3.4Ghz turbo, 6MB, Quad Core)
Nvidia GeForce GT650M 2GB GDDR5
8GB 1600MHz DDR3 (2x4gb)
1TB Serial ATA + 32GB SSD mSATA (pláss fyrir annan disk)
DVD & BluRay writer
Intel Centrino 2230 (802.11n) wireless + Bluetooth v4.0, Backlit keyboard
Webcam & Microphone
2x Skullcandy speakers + subwoofer, Waves MaxxAudio 4.0 hljóðkort
RJ45, 10/100 Ethernet, 3x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 with PowerShare, 8-in-1 minniskortalesari, VGA, HDMI 1.4a
6 Cell 48W/HR Lithium-Ion battery
Windows 8.1 (64bit)
SELD!
Sími: 662-6419
